entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 10:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
